pages.text: The Bayou Hut is a small hut found in the Enchanted Bayou biome. It contains a chest that has several items related to Hexalia.$(br2)The backyard has a herb farm, in which you can find Nightshade Bushes, Spirit Blooms and Infused Dirt/Farmland.
The Barren Hut is a structure found in the desert, it consist of a hut in which you can find Salt Blocks.$(br2)The Barren Hut also hosts a new type of plant, the Saltsprout.
